name: Joan DENNIS, Administratrix of the Estate of Dominique Dennis and Joan Dennis as Trustee Ad Litem and David Dennis and Joan Dennis, in their own right, Respondents, v. CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, Petitioner, and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation, and Norman Scotton, Respondents

parties: Joan DENNIS, Administratrix of the Estate of Dominique Dennis and Joan Dennis as Trustee Ad Litem and David Dennis and Joan Dennis, in their own right, Respondents, v. CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, Petitioner, and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation, and Norman Scotton, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted. The case is remanded to the Commonwealth Court for reconsideration in accordance with our decision in Dickens v. Upper Chichester Township, 531 Pa. 127, 611 A.2d 693 (1992).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
619 A.2d 1349
Joan DENNIS, Administratrix of the Estate of Dominique Dennis and Joan Dennis as Trustee Ad Litem and David Dennis and Joan Dennis, in their own right, Respondents, v. CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, Petitioner, and Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation, and Norman Scotton, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 17, 1992.
